TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ParseChildrenAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ParseChildrenAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ParseChildrenAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义可在开发 ASP.NET 服务器控件时使用的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines a metadata attribute that you can use when developing ASP.NET server controls.

summary.span: 使用 类指示页分析器应如何处理页上声明的服务器控件标记中嵌套的内容。

span.span: Use the class to indicate how the page parser should treat content nested inside a server control tag declared on a page.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类，可通过将与该服务器控件标记指定的自定义服务器控件的解析逻辑元数据属性。The class allows you to specify parsing logic for a custom server control by marking the server control with the metadata attribute. 标记与元数据属性服务器控件`ParseChildren(true)`指示分析器来解释为属性的服务器控件的标记中包含的元素。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true)` instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as properties. 在此方案中，属性是`true`。In this scenario, the property is `true`. 标记与元数据属性服务器控件`ParseChildren(true,"")`设置属性传递到该特性的属性的名称。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(true,"")` sets the property to the name of the property that is passed into the attribute. 标记与元数据属性服务器控件`ParseChildren(false)`，默认值，指示分析器来解释为将分析的内容服务器控件的标记内包含的元素具有一个关联，即为控件。Marking your server control with the metadata attribute `ParseChildren(false)`, the default value, instructs the parser to interpret the elements that are contained within the server control's tags as content that will be parsed with an associated that is, as controls. 在此方案中，属性是`false`。In this scenario, the property is `false`. 有关使用属性的信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 本部分中的代码示例包含两个部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性类。The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页中的类。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置对象的一个名为的自定义服务器控件`CollectionPropertyControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to set the object of a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`. 设置属性`true`和属性`Employee`类。The sets the property to `true` and the property to the `Employee` class. [!code-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/CS/parsechildren.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/VB/parsechildren.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 页中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. 实例`Employee`以声明方式添加类。Instances of the `Employee` class are added declaratively. [!code-aspx-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/CS/parsechildren.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_1#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_1/VB/parsechildren.aspx#3)]

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the property to determine if the elements that are contained within a server control are parsed as properties of the server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`childrenAsProperties`是`false`，为控件分析的服务器控件内包含的元素。If `childrenAsProperties` is `false`, the elements that are contained within the server control are parsed as a control. `false` 默认设置是。`false` is the default for . ## Examples 本部分中的代码示例包含两个部分。The code example in this section contains two parts. 第一个代码示例演示如何设置属性类。The first code example demonstrates how to set properties for the class. 第二个代码示例演示如何使用 ASP.NET 页中的类。The second code example demonstrates how to use classes in an ASP.NET page. 下面的代码示例演示如何设置名为的自定义服务器控件的对象`CollectionPropertyControl`。The following code example demonstrates how to set the object for a custom server control named `CollectionPropertyControl`. 当类定义之前声明`CollectionPropertyControl`、设置属性`true`。When the is declared before the class defining `CollectionPropertyControl`, the sets the property to `true`. [!code-csharp[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/CS/parsechildren.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ParseChildrenAttribute_2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/ParseChildrenAttribute_2/VB/parsechildren.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`ASP.NET 页中的类。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes in an ASP.NET page. 一个实例`Employee`以声明方式添加类和另一个以编程方式添加。One instance of the `Employee` class is added declaratively and another is added programmatically. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果允许的控件类型是`null`，含义尚未指定，默认类型，即控制，则返回。If the allowed control type is `null`, meaning that it has not been specified, the default type, which is a control, is returned. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询属性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the property. 有关的定义`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`类的使用在此代码示例，请参阅。For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see . Public Shared ReadOnly Default As ParseChildrenAttribute

span.span: Defines the default value for the class.
This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为字段是`false`，这意味着元素不被分析为服务器控件的属性。The default value for the field is `false`, which means that elements are not parsed as properties of the server control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ DefaultProperty { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置元素被分析为的服务器控件的默认属性。

span.span: Gets or sets the default property for the server control into which the elements are parsed.

value.span: 元素被分析为的服务器控件的默认集合属性的名称。

span.span: The name of the default collection property of the server control into which the elements are parsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当字符串传递给使用属性构造函数。The property is used only if a string is passed to the constructor. 当创建类，属性定义正在分析的服务器控件的默认属性。When the class is created, the property defines the default property for the server control that is being parsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何查询属性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the property. 有关的定义`CollectionPropertyControl`和`Employee`类的使用在此代码示例，请参阅。For definitions of the `CollectionPropertyControl` and `Employee` classes that are used in this code example, see . MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute ParseAsChildren
Public Shared ReadOnly ParseAsChildren As ParseChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 指示包含在服务器控件内的嵌套内容被分析为控件。

span.span: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within the server control is parsed as controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果调用字段时，服务器控件内包含的嵌套的内容不被分析为属性; 相反，它们将被分析为控件。If the field is called, the nested content that are contained within the server control are not parsed as properties; rather, they are parsed as a control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Web.UI.ParseChildrenAttribute ParseAsProperties
Public Shared ReadOnly ParseAsProperties As ParseChildrenAttribute

summary.span: 指示包含在服务器控件内的嵌套内容被分析为控件的属性。

span.span: Indicates that the nested content that is contained within a server control is parsed as properties of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果字段被调用时，服务器控件中包含的嵌套的内容被分析为属性。If the field is called, the nested content contained within a server control is parsed as properties.
